title: Provisions) (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 6 of 2025), hereby order as follows:

text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2025” means the Finance (Local Property Tax and 

Other Provisions) (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 6 of 2025).

title: Provisions) (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 6 of 2025), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Subject to Article 4, the 21st day of July 2025 is appointed as the day on
text_raw:
3. Subject to Article 4, the 21st day of July 2025 is appointed as the day on 

which Parts 1 and 2 of the Act of 2025 shall come into operation.
text_norm: 3 subject article 4 21st day july 2025 appointed day part 1 2 act 2025 shall come operation

title: Provisions) (Amendment) Act 2025 (No. 6 of 2025), hereby order as follows:
heading: 4. The 1st day of January 2026 is appointed as the day on which section 9
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of January 2026 is appointed as the day on which section 9 

of the Act of 2025 shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 July, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd July, 2025.
